hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report by name is Dave and this is
episode 1648 a.n today's date is August
2018 and the title of the episode is the
plan to remove the central bank is in
motion now before I get started I just
want to make an announcement I uploaded
a new interview with Bix we're it is on
the x-22 report spotlight YouTube
channel so all you need to do is go over
to YouTube type in X 20 to report
spotlight it will bring you right to the
interview or you can come over to the X
20 to report calm or new sentinel comm
site scroll down a little bit look over
to your right hand side you can play the
interview right on the sites or go to
steam it that is steam it calm /at X 20
to report and you can play the interview
right on steam it let's get into the
economic collapse financial news now
we've been talking about how Trump
Jinping Putin they're working together
to get rid of the central bank and we
can see already that the entire plan is
in motion now we've been talking about
real estate GDP unemployment and we look
at numbers and we say oh look things
aren't going well look in the real
estate market we can see prices are
coming down traffic is drawing up in
certain areas and we always look at
numbers but now when we look at
companies that actually handle the
mortgage applications like Wells Fargo
remember Wells Fargo's mortgage
department that was their bread and
butter for their entire business and yes
I know they've been in a lot of trouble
with you know client information and
things like that but when we look at
Wells Fargo right now they reported the
worst set of mortgage numbers since the
financial crisis with both mortgage
applications and mortgage originations
they are both tumbling to levels not
seen in a decade and if you go back in
time you can see how their entire
mortgage department how the applications
the mortgage originations how they've
been declining since 2013 now this just
didn't happen overnight
because they got into trouble you know
and
20:16 or whatever the date was and all
of a sudden you know they're trying to
get their image back this has been
ongoing since that period of time and
it's getting worse and worse
as time goes on now Wells Fargo because
of this they're going to be cutting 638
mortgage employees and they're saying
it's because of the crippling slowdown
in their mortgage business and once
again we saw this back in 2007 going
into 2000 the housing market really hit
you saw a lot of individuals being laid
off in the mortgage arena we're seeing
the same thing right now
so the entire system is breaking down
and every time we look at something else
we can see that it's hitting something
else and confirming us to us that yes it
is breaking down now we know that Trump
Putin Xi Jingping
they're working together to bring down
this central bank system and of course
Trump has made some announcement saying
that you know he doesn't believe that
the Fed should be raising rates at this
point in time
he thought that Powell was going to be
the easy money type of Fed Chairman like
we used to have he's very upset about
this why would he be raising interest
rates during a period of time when the
debt is coming due when the economy is
doing so well what would be the point of
all this and we know that when the Fed
raises rates the whole thing starts to
break down because it's based on an
illusion and I think a lot of people
don't understand what is happening here
the entire system going all the way back
to 2008 since that crash and before that
but it really accepted accelerated
during that period of time they created
this gigantic illusion by manipulating
all the numbers and the numbers have
been manipulated before that but they
really took it into overdrive during
this period of time because they
realized there was no way they were
going to explain the economy away unless
they manipulated the numbers and since
they manipulated the numbers they
created this gigantic illusion in many
different sectors of the
economy and a lot of it doesn't even
make sense because you're seeing retail
breakdown you're seeing manufacturing
slow we know the unemployment numbers
are completely fake phony and false but
what's very interesting about this is
what Trump said that he thought Jerome
Powell was going to create more currency
and he continually calls out Powell
saying he doesn't think it's a good time
to raise interest rates and it's not a
good time because debt is coming due and
I believe what is happening here is that
he's using the strategy to make everyone
believe that he's against Powell in what
he's doing actually now that I'm
thinking about and I see the strategy
that Trump uses and the way Q reports on
what is going on here Powell and Trump
might be working together in all of this
because Powell says he's gonna continue
with raising the rates and what Trump
does with this strategy is to make the
corporate media come out and say we need
to keep this individual you can't say
anything about the Fed how dare you
mention the Fed at all actually in a
negative way and he's calling out Powell
just like he's calling out sessions
making everyone think the opposite and
Powell is going to raise interest rates
he's not going to be this easy money
even though they're still printing this
easy money type of Fed he's going to do
things a little differently and what's
very interesting about this is that Fed
chair Powell said higher interest rates
are making the economy healthier for
staving off the risks of overheating and
asset bubbles now we both know that
Trump knows there's tons of asset
bubbles he said it before he was
president he knows that the stock
markets in a bubble he knows the housing
markets in a bubble
Powell also stressed further increases
in base borrowing costs would continue
as long as economic growth keeps its
momentum
he said the economy is strong inflation
is her is around 2% most people who want
a job are finding one if the strong
growth and income and jobs continue
further gradual increases in the target
range for the federal funds rate will
likely be appropriate powell stressed
that the central bank's policy approach
remains data dependent and every
decision to raise rates or it leave them
unchanged comes after a fresh batch of
inflation and employment data the Fed
chair stressed this allows them to
minimize the risk of policy mistakes
that could actually hurt GDP growth now
we know that they recalculated GDP they
manipulated it to make you think that
GDP is a lot higher than it is
we know that unemployment numbers are
manipulated and by these statements it's
telling us that he's working hand in
hand with Trump to show that the
economy's doing well and they're going
to raise interest rates and I believe
this is the narrative they're going to
be setting up here this is the push to
take down the central bank because they
both know that this is going to bring
down the central bank system and Trump
is out there and he was asked if he
believed in the feds independence well
he kind of sidetracked the whole entire
question Trump said I believe in the Fed
doing what's good for the country he'd
really didn't answer the question which
tells you he doesn't believe in the feds
independence and of course if he came
out and said no I don't believe in the
feds independence well this would been a
huge mistake because the mainstream
media would have been all over this
instead he sidetracked it's saying I
believe in the in the Fed doing what's
good for the country now of course he
knows the feds not doing what's good for
the country
he knows the Fed is a private
corporation and then they ask them
a question about Powell are you happy
with Powell and Trump said the following
I am happy with my choice and I'll let
you know in seven years so what that
tells us is that the entire system that
we know today is going to be brought
down within this period of time with in
this period of time of Trump being
president and he's also pushing it out
that he's going to be President the next
term because both terms add them
together four plus four is eight that be
eight years in seven years he's saying
that we will find out if this whole
thing worked and I do believe at this
point that Powell might be working with
Trump Putin Xi Jingping
to bring this entire system down and
Russia is out there and we know more
sanctions were placed on certain
corporations we see that the Russian
Foreign Minister Deputy Foreign Minister
Sergei Ryabkov said that since these
sanctions were put into place thank God
all of this is happening Russia is going
to be moving away from the dollar it's
time to ditch the dollar now what's very
interesting about all all of this that
were we're watching right now is that
Trump never admits that the Fed is
independent he says that he's happy with
his choice he'll know seven years from
now and he also realizes that all the
countries around the world like Russia
China and the rest are going to have to
move away from the dollar because of
their holding the dollar it's going to
bring them down too and we know from
Russia where they said many countries
should use their national currencies
they shouldn't be using the dollar and I
think what's happening at this point is
all these countries are being pushed
away from the dollar on purpose to set
up this reset
of this system now it doesn't mean that
this resets gonna happen in one fell
swoop this is gonna go on for a period
of time how long it's going to last we
don't know and we're gonna see certain
individuals fight against this so this
is not going to be an open and shut type
of case where you know you snap your
finger the whole thing comes down we
bring it up in three months everything
looks great look what's happening with
the d p-- say look what's been happening
with bringing people to justice it
doesn't happen with the snap of a finger
because these individuals just don't
give up the central bank is not just
going to give up it's going to be a
battle on to the end so we're gonna see
many attempts to do this and it's gonna
be very rough on people it's gonna be
very rough on people around the world
because we need to get out of this
system and move into into a brand new
system and this is no easy task but we
can see that this is all being set up
right now it's been set up for quite a
while actually to move to a central
banking system now they're rotating and
making it so they can trade using their
national currencies instead of using the
dollar because when this hits it's going
to bring the entire world to a
screeching halt for a period of time and
then everything has to be rebooted to
start up again and many countries gonna
be limping along until all this is said
and done so we can see right now that
they're prepping everything and this is
going to take a long period of time so
be prepared
listen everyone thanks a lot for
listening be well be safe and especially
be prepared thanks a lot
